sentences.en: After a shower like this, the grassland becomes even greener and has a fresher scent.
sentences.cn: 象缀满草尖上的水珠,却又象数不清的金刚钻.

sentences.en: An effective purifying with antibacterial plant extracts to minimise blemishes and encourage a clearer, fresher complexion.
sentences.cn: 抗菌植物萃取有效的净化肌肤,减少瑕疵, 使肌肤更加纯净.

sentences.en: And the air is cooler and fresher.
Dry - clean dressy jeans. This will keep the rinse darker and fresher - looking.
sentences.cn: 干洗做工精细考究的牛仔裤. 干洗可洗净衣物并保持原色不折旧.

sentences.en: I close curtain now, feeling broader , fresher act is over.
sentences.cn: 现在我拉拢窗帘, 感觉心胸更开阔,头脑更清醒.

sentences.en: I close the curtain now, feeling broader , fresher act is over.
sentences.cn: 合上窗帘, 感觉心胸更开阔,头脑更清晰.

sentences.en: She ignorant of all things of the company for she's fresher.
sentences.cn: 她是个新人,对咱们公司的情况几乎一无所知.

sentences.en: Some fresher stamp of the time - bettering days.
sentences.cn: 这迈进时代的更生动的写照.

sentences.en: The air fresher and the people are nicer and friendlier.
sentences.cn: 空气较新鲜,人也比较好,比较友善.

sentences.en: The air is fresher and the people are nicer and friendlier.
sentences.cn: 空气较新鲜,人也比较好、比较友善.

sentences.en: The air is fresher in countryside than in city.
The doctor advised my mother to live where the air fresher.
sentences.cn: 医生建议我母亲住在空气更新鲜的地方.

sentences.en: The sky will be bluer, the air will be fresher.
sentences.cn: 天空将会更蓝, 空气将会更清新.

sentences.en: The weeping willows looked fresher and greener after the rain.
sentences.cn: 雨后,垂柳显得格外青翠.

sentences.en: This Brand of toothpaste can make your mouth cleaner and Breath fresher.
sentences.cn: 这种牌子的牙膏能使您的口腔更加清洁,呼吸更加清爽.
